snippet: Greece’s president will start negotiations on Sunday to form a coalition government in a last-ditch effort to avoid new elections and further political turmoil.
abstract: Pres Karolos Papoulias of Greece will try to form a coalition government in a last-ditch effort to avoid new elections and further political turmoil; earlier efforts to form a unity government have failed; analysts say it is highly unlikely that he will succeed, given deep divisions over the country’s debt deal with foreign lenders that demanded strict austerity measures.
lead_paragraph: Greece’s president will start negotiations on Sunday to form a coalition government in a last-ditch effort to avoid new elections and further political turmoil.

headline.seo: Greece’s President Will Try to Broker a Coalition Government
headline.main: Greek Leader Will Attempt to Broker a Coalition
headline.print_headline: Greek Leader Will Attempt To Broker A Coalition
